body.p: Code templates are code fragments that can be inserted quickly at the editing position. comes with a set of ready-to use templates for XSL, XQuery, and XML Schema. You can also define you own code templates and share them with others.
To get a complete list of available code templates, press . To enter the code template, select it from the list or type its shortcut code and press Enter.
If you know the template shortcut, type it and press .
Code templates are also displayed when you press the content completion keys, or Enter in Author mode.

p.ph: For more details, see the example for XSLT editor code templates.

body.p: To watch our video demonstration about code templates, go to http://oxygenxml.com/demo/Code_Templates.html.
